description:
Affiliate Marketing, Fast Track to becoming an Authority is a completely brand new guide sharing step-by-step, how to get starting in affiliate marketing -- even if you have no idea where to start, with over 30 lectures and an hour and half of content!

It's not just another course filled with theory and fluff, it will guide you all the way and get you to take action by the end of the course.

This is the perfect guide if you're looking to, make a living online and work when, where and how you want, add an additional revenue stream or, learn how to become a top affiliate marketer

You will also get a complete checklist that's like a summary of all the important points from the course, except in actionable steps that easy to digest. A simple glance over the provided Mindmap and you'll get an instant refresher of all the major points and action steps from the main guide.

Plus a Resource Cheat Sheet, with top sites, books, tools, software and more!. It includes topics such as:

  • Affiliate networks
  • Creation tools
  • Pay-Per-Click resources
  • Email marketing services
  • Outsourcing resources
title: Affiliate Marketing, Fast Track to becoming an Authority
